In this movie, Viktoria is a 40-year-old woman who seems to have gone mad and develops a compelling and moving monologue of moments that marked her existence. Viktoria (Sophie Marceau), a bishop's daughter and pastor's wife, talks to herself and reveals her intimate world: her joys and woes, her childhood and her relationship with her cheating and aloof husband. She voyages from life to life, seemingly playing several roles. She remembers, dreams, fantasizes and hallucinates, bringing back to life her late husband, mother, father and friends.","poster_path":"/csVe0WaPDIO6DgBN0s32veDn4WA.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":3.991,"release_date":"2015-12-03","video":false,"vote_average":4.6,"vote_count":17},{"backdrop_path":"/7dwI2VBk6bQn7GiNHA1o5zTtCVg.jpg","id":533607,"title":"Birds in the Earth","original_title":"Eatnanvulos lottit - Maan sisällä linnut","overview":"Sami dance students Birit and Katja Haarla dance through the villages and lost woods of Sápmi all the way to where the important decisions are made.
